comment: Well lazy progress is still progress
*bounces with anticipation for new MM page*
I do believe Cox is screwing with my internet.
A few weeks ago I got an offer for a new modem. Talked with a rep and told them I was doing alright with my current setup.
All of the sudden my internet has gone to shit https://i.imgur.com/ba7Gs9z.png
Steadily getting worse since my conversation with their rep :thinking:
Internet gone to tosh, Dadrobit? I've been there.
Honestly I didn't mind the offer of a free new modem. It was when the rep started upselling the modem + wi-fi router at a monthly premium that I got antsy.
"No I don't need that, my router is fine...." "No sir, you really should try it with our new ~Panoramic~ wi-fi technology."
Was asking about their offer they sent me in the email for a free modem.
The conversation almost immediately turned into the rep trying to sell me a modem, so I told him that my current one is fine.
Hey, Dadrobit, are you going to try Book club again in February?
Yeah, I'll get it done eventually.
As always with that one, you have my vote.
I really like it as a suggestion.
I think the last thing that got through for me was Sythe riding a super-sized Nibble doing the Akira slide some 7 months ago actually?
You will-either as a vote, or a Tom pick.
This is actually taking longer to get through than me tring to get my Keith/Maddie/Dead Natani suggestion in.
I'm actually thinking of requesting a sequel to Halo Raine, where she's with Spartan Kessah, sparring with the Master Chief.
But I have a Star Wars and Subnautica one first
I've actually done fanart with Kessah from HoSalamanstra as a Spartan IV...
I've been drawing a lot lately.
Wait, no. I might be high. The last one I got in was Dust and Fidget on Halloween.
"CrimsonQuill deviantart" is not pulling anything relevent
I can't change it on Deviantart...
And I don't want to do that until my art's reached a higher standard.
I can link it to you, if you like.
Try to be a bit smoother with your colour. You are very streaky. Other than that you have a decent foundation to work with.
Bear in mind I'm using Crayola colouring pencils
And this was my first colour drawing in years
And all the others were made when my art skill could be summed up as very poor.
I'm trying to blend in colours together, and layer them over each other,
Excuses. Crayola is fine if you know hoe to use them.
I don't really know how to use them.
I'm trying to teach myself, see.
Halo Kessah is the first time I consider myself to have drawn something at a decent level, and the first picture I really tried to colour in.
So, I'm just drawing and colouring-learning as I go.
My ‚ÄúFlora‚Äù that I decided to colour different so she is not so Flora like.
You should probably just accept advice and apply it instead of making excuses and brushing it off if you want to improve.
@Mippy I understand that I shouldn't make excuses. I'm not trying to do so.
I'm just trying to experiment...teach myself how to do stuff...
It‚Äôs fine to experiment. That‚Äôs cool.
I hope to see improvement in your next one.
I'll probably have the 'streaky colour' problem for a while...
My ultimate goal is to reach the level of my two artist sisters/Tom/Jon Joesco/DestinyBlue.
Once I've got myself into the once a week, I'll try twice a week.
Yeah, set goals mate. You gotta use it or you‚Äôll lose it or something :ctwokinds-evalswink_sparkl:
All drawing is is a lot of practice
Another goal is to DRASTICALLY cut back video game and net procrastination.
But of course, when push comes to shove, I still have to look out for my surveying work.
A single mistake can be catastrophic in that field.
Well there you go. :ctwokinds-NataniHAHA: I‚Äôll often have something on in the background as I work...but things I don‚Äôt have to ‚Äúwatch‚Äù like a audio book, podcast, or music
I just haven't taken time for it in too long.
Once again the PC eats my soul.
Got some Beck going now...wonder what shuffle will choose next
I must've listened to Asgore's theme from undertale about 5 times yesterday...including two orchestral remixes.
I really like John Powell's HTTYD soundtrack too.
Martin O'Donnel, Niel Davidge, Kazuma Jinnouchi...
Just got done talking with the folks I was working for for the last two weeks. The pay cut was a clerical error and was already caught.
The paycheck for the difference should already be in the mail. No litigation required.
*Insert "You're gonna start a howl!" quote here*
me waiting for the new MM page: :ctwokinds-clovisgirl_shake:
New Patreon Post: Magical Mishaps - Story 1 Page 6 https://www.patreon.com/posts/magical-mishaps-23731790
Hm I think I know when this page was drawn. Some time ago, Tom asked "Did Maddie see naked Keidran earlier."
In the main comic itself, I believe the closest she's ever been is when Kat and Natani came out of the water on the docks, but even then they were covered.
Of course, off-panel, she probably would have inevitably encountered flora or kat roaming the ship at some point, but I've never actually drawn her reacting to such a thing.
Although you did not draw naked Keidran and Maddie on the same frame. I still think Maddie should have seen them earlier. Given that Kat and Flora often do not wear clothes.
In addition, Nathan often has problems with clothes.
All I'm saying is I've never drawn how she reacts to it.
I wonder why she was not shy when she saw a naked woman.
Shy is sly and mischievous, but still a Basitin.
Maddie is sly and mischievous, but still a Basitin.
Katana tails are a basidian thing it seem.
Didn‚Äôt you say you weren‚Äôt a platformer
Well, I don't play a lot of them.
Oh I just remembered, tom did you end up fixing the has to have on that last sketch suggestion on sunday? :o
I just tried plugging my phone to a charger
But the light would come on, phone no charge
A scrap of white plastic fell out of the charger and despite both ports not having an obvious piece missing and the cable looking just as fine, I tried replacing this piece
The other end of the cord just wasn‚Äôt plugged in my phone right
Now I‚Äôve gotta figure out what this lil piece is
I might nap. But Tom, there‚Äôs a question up there for you when you look back in ^
I was gonna say.. ya done spammed my question up and out of the chat :V Œõ: :V
It might be a secret as of right now, but did you ever try that sketch with the dragons that you said would require too much  trial and error for the stream?
I'll push your question even further up, bgr. I just gotta say hello to everyone o/
Well I don't know what it was
I asked if you fixed the has to have in the last sketch on sunday lol
There was a grammatical error in the last sunday sketch.
:ptv-confused: well.. if the image comes out and it's not fixed, it won't be so secret anymore..
but for now I guess it is.
Well then why won't you tell me what it is
Has any of you seen a dog around? -> Have any of you seen a dog around?
but if I told tom about the grammar error, then it wouldn't be a secret now would it! :ptv-shock:
"Has any of you" is gramatically correct.
You wouldn't ask a bunch of people with has
And if I would use that phrase, than someone like Mike certainly would.
Has is when you use he she and it, have is when you use I, you, we, and they
has is a 3rd person, but mike is addressing them directly
But again, I wouldn't think this much about it. And I feel like an uneducated sailor wouldn't either.
leave the boy and his wording alone
But if it bothers you that much, I'll make it have
Even though I don't think it's a big deal.
well, I didn't think it was a big deal either, I just didn't know if you did it intentionally because it was mike, or if it was accidental.
He's never spoken in an uneducated way in the comic before
I wrote it that way because that's how I say it
maybe with this we can repair more than just the text in the sketch :ptv-excited:
For some strange reason a strong black coffee with run does not have any adverse effects on me like it used to,
probably because your body is used to it
it's built up a resistance to both the coffee and the rum
I meant tea... dunno why I wrote coffee.
still, gonna enjoy it while I'm resistant to it
